title: Stephen R. Lawhead - 20 books (epub, mobi)
description:
**by request**

Twenty books by Christian fantasy/historical fiction author Stephen R. Lawhead. Formats are epub and mobi for all books; quality varies, but they all seem to be in pretty good shape.


Includes the following:

Dragon King trilogy (single omnibus volume):

In the Hall of the Dragon King (1982)
The Warlords of Nin (1983)
The Sword and the Flame (1984)


The Pendragon Cycle:

Taliesin (1987)
Merlin (1988)
Arthur (1989)
Pendragon (1994)
Grail (1997)

The Song of Albion:

The Paradise War (1991)
The Silver Hand (1992)
The Endless Knot (1993)

The Celtic Crusades:

The Iron Lance (1998)
The Black Rood (2000)
The Mystic Rose (2001)

King Raven Trilogy:

Hood (2006)
Scarlet (2007)
Tuck (2009)

Bright Empires:

The Skin Map (2010)
The Bone House (2011)
The Spirit Well (2012)

Stand-alone novels:

Byzantium (1996)
Avalon: The Return of King Arthur (1999) 

---------------

Does not include Patrick: Son of Ireland (2003), but I should be able to post it soon.
